name: Ant Force
description:
Playing ant you will have an unbelievable fight with AI.
Gears are capable of destroying the environment, so be careful when shooting.
Beat up parcels to heal yourself and use shields.
Use all abilities of the jetpack to fly, it will help you take up the most advantageous tactic position.
There is a Player-to-Player Mode, so you can fight with another person on your PC.

Features:


  • breathtaking game process
  • destroyable landscape
  • Player-to-Player Mode
